profileSummary: I believe in the power of data and technology to transform ideas into impactful solutions. My journey has been shaped by a love for problem-solving, analytics, and a knack for AI. I'm Sagar, a recent Master's graduate from NYU Stern and Courant, with a background in Computer Science and Information Systems. With over 2 years of experience building intelligent systems that bridge business and technology, with a focus on data science, AI, and full stack real-time analytics.
